title: FS--N154 Duke's Presidential Base Ball Club Card
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FS--N154 Duke's Presidential Base Ball Club Card
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David Goff
I have a rare N154 1890 Duke's Tobacco Presidential Baseball Club card. These cards are very hard to come by. Card is of Benjamin Harrison. This is one of my favorite cards and I hate to get rid of this, but my wife wants to remodel our bathroom, so I have to sacrifice. This card has some issues as you can tell by the scans but overall has nice eye appeal. Does have a tear in the upper right corner. Don't know if it shows in the scan. Any questions, please email me david.goff@insightbb.com 


$200.00. Price includes shipping and DC/insurance. I take PayPal, money orders, or checks.







[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/makersmarkambassador/nonsporttobacoocards/nonsports/N154%20Benjamin%20Harrison.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/makersmarkambassador/nonsporttobacoocards/nonsports/n154%20harrison%20back.jpg[/IMG]
